intro.title: See My Projects
intro.text: Check out the cool work I've done in past years. There are projects here ranging from school projects, hobbyist projects as well as projects I've learnt for from courses.

projects.name: Task Tracker
projects.desc: Keep track of your tasks the easy way!

projects.desc: Select all dice with same number of dots!

projects.name: Quizzical
projects.desc: Test your knowledge of everything with our quiz app!

projects.name: Emoticons
projects.desc: A site about Emoticons and their importance in communication.

projects.name: Ryszard Szurkowski

projects.name: Covid-19 Vaccines
